long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure Password Generator | With this tool you will be able to quickly generate a password based on guidelines that you set to create strong and unpredictable passwords for each of your accounts.

• Adjust guidelines to fit different sites unique password requirements 
• Generate strong passwords using secure technology with built-in randomness
•  Save settings for easy reuse
